trans:
If a signal to stop the vehicle is given by a person who is not a police officer, such a request may be ignored by the driver, as only police officers have the right to stop vehicles (except in areas designated as border zones).
1.2. Stopping the vehicle based on subparagraph 4 of paragraph 15 of the Resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine (CMU) dated December 29, 2021, No. 1455.
This resolution regulates only cases where a special regime is established on a certain territory by an order of the military command together with the military administration. This does not refer to a state of martial law, as it is introduced by a Presidential Decree, but rather to measures such as "imposing a curfew." The establishment of a special regime is provided for in Part 5 of the said resolution, namely, the special regime is established by issuing an order by the military command together with the military administration, appointing a commandant. This order defines:
the tasks of the commandant, the authority to ensure unified management of the designated forces and resources of the State Special Transport Service, National Guard, State Border Service, National Police, SBU, State Migration Service, State Emergency Service, military administrations, and the coordination of their actions during the implementation of special regime measures;
the composition of the commandant's offices, their locations, zones of responsibility, and the procedure for interaction, as well as the procedure for carrying out the assigned tasks.
